name: Introducing mirrors
initialHint: Goal: lead a photon from the laser to the detector. Drag and drop mirrors from the right panel. Click an element to rotate. Click the laser to fire a photon.

name: Introducing beam splitters
initialHint: New element: beam splitter.</br>Make sure that every detector has some change od detecting a photon.

boardHints.text: each run only a single detector clicks
but we display probabilities as well

texts.before: Sometimes in order to join you need to break.

boardHints.text: run it to see what happens
if you don't know what to do

texts.before: Comebacks can turn out either way.
Block light so it can pass.
Should I bounce or should I pass?
It has its sweet, circular basis.
Sort polarization before it's too late!
